pages.text: O altar é uma estrutura Multi-Bloco nessecaria para o craft nesse mod.$(br2)As receitas de altar podem ser obtidas pelo JEI(Just Enough Items), e a construção requer que o player $(l:overview/power_point)power point$().

pages.name: Altar
pages.text: Use o $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$() para clicar na lã vermelha do centro-direita na quarta camada para construir o altar.

You can place the item by right-clicking on the top of the six oak pillars of the altar. You can remove the item by empty-handed right-clicking.$(br2)When the item is completely placed and the player's power point is enough, altar can trigger craft.$(br2)The craft is interrupted due to lack of power, and after obtaining enough power, right click again to re-trigger the craft.

pages.title: Fabricar Altar
pages.text: The craft of spawn lightning, remember all craft is shapeless.
